mapper.update:
update house
house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
metro_id = #{metroId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
estate = #{estate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
listings_type = #{listingsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rental_mode = #{rentalMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent = #{rent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
house_introduction = #{houseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkin_time = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=DATE},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`call` = #{call,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update house set house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, metro_id = #{metroId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, estate = #{estate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, listings_type = #{listingsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rental_mode = #{rentalMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rent = #{rent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, house_introduction = #{houseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkin_time = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `call` = #{call,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select house.*,region.*,metro.* from house,metro,region,house_ref_user,house_ref_label,house_ref_deploy where house.region_id = region.id and house.metro_id = metro.id and house_ref_user.house_id = house.id and house_ref_label.house_id = house.id and house_ref_deploy.house_id = house.id limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.update:
update house
house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
metro_id = #{metroId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
estate = #{estate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
listings_type = #{listingsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rental_mode = #{rentalMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent = #{rent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
house_introduction = #{houseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkin_time = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=DATE},

`call` = #{call,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.house_type, h.estate, h.listings_type, h.rental_mode, h.room_type, h.rent, h.house_introduction, h.checkin_time, h.sex, h.`call`, h.tel, m.metro_line, m.station, r.distrct_name, r.street FROM house AS h INNER JOIN region AS r ON h.region_id = r.id INNER JOIN metro AS m ON h.metro_id = m.id
SELECT h.*, m.*, r.* FROM house AS h INNER JOIN metro AS m ON h.metro_id = m.id INNER JOIN region AS r ON h.region_id = r.id WHERE h.id = #{id}
